title: Tarja - Live  At  Circa  Volador, Mexico City  192k     2008
description:
Tarja Soile Susanna Cabuli (nÃƒÂ©e Turunen; born August 17, 1977), generally known as Tarja, is a Finnish singer-songwriter. She is a light lyric soprano and has a vocal range of three octaves.



Tarja was dismissed from Nightwish on October 21, 2005 for personal reasons. She started her solo career in 2006 with the release of a Christmas album called HenkÃƒÂ¤ys ikuisuudesta. In 2007, Turunen released My Winter Storm, an album featuring various styles, including alternative rock and symphonic metal and started the Storm World Tour. Tarja released her third album, What Lies Beneath, in 2010. She also can be heard on the latest Scorpions record. She performed several concerts in Europe, playing in metal festivals including the Graspop Metal Meeting and the Wacken Open Air, before starting the What Lies Beneath World Tour, which lasted until April 8, 2012. Tarja's first live DVD Act I was filmed during this tour on March 30 and March 31, 2012 in Rosario, Argentina. Act I was released on August 24, 2012. On the 6th of May it was announced that the 4th album (released 28 August 2013) would be named Colours in the Dark. Tarja started the Colours in the Dark World Tour on October 17, 2013 to promote her new album. On 20 February it was revealed on the blog that a new version of the album called Left in the Dark would be released later this year and will feature different versions of the songs on the original Colours in the Dark. Tarja's second live DVD was filmed during the events of Beauty and the Beat featuring a big orchestra, choir, Mike Terrana and Tarja herself and was released on May 30. On the 29th of July, 2014 it was announced that Tarja will be one of the star coaches of the popular tv program The Voice of Finland. The show's fourth season would air in the spring of 2015 on Nelonen.Hope she dont stay on that, it always seems that any actual talent that becomes a TV show judge is at the end of there career..................... ..................................................................................................................................................................See...................files.....................for .................track......................titles...............See files for track titles..........and seed it took me days of  reviving this to get it...........
